title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, May 31, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of poet Walt Whitman (1819), who was once fired from a job at the Department of the Interior for being a "very bad man" and a "free lover."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of poet Walt Whitman (1819), who was once fired from a job at the Department of the Interior for being a "very bad man" and a "free lover."
